decks.notes: The main concept of this Grixis Control deck is to disrupt the opponent's game plan with a mix of removal and hand disruption spells while generating card advantage through card draw and planeswalkers. The deck aims to control the board using cards like Baleful Strix and Swords to Plowshares, while also disrupting the opponent's hand with Hymn to Tourach and Inquisition of Kozilek. Additionally, the deck has access to powerful planeswalkers like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Teferi, Time Raveler to help control the game and secure victory.
